Obtain an angler larvae for <Alias=Alchemist> in <Alias=Town> (<Global=ccBGSSSE001_RadiantObjCount>/<Global=ccBGSSSE001_RadiantObjTotal>)

string: 閱讀懸賞：燈籠幼魚樣本

original: Swims-In-Deep-Water has given me another fishing challenge. I should read the list he gave me to see what I will need to catch.
string: 深水泳客給了我另一項釣魚挑戰。我應該閱讀他給我的清單，看看我要釣到哪些魚。

original: The fish that Swims-In-Deep-Water would like me to catch are a bit more elusive than last time. However, they come to the surface more frequently while it is raining. I should refer to the second volume of Fishing Mastery to learn more. He also asked me to help fish up his lucky fishing hat, lost at a fishing spot west of Sarethi Farm. He claims that it rains wherever he wears the hat when fishing. That sounds far-fetched, but I suppose I could use all the luck I can get.
string: 這次深水泳客要我釣的魚比上次難抓。不過牠們在雨天時會更常靠近水面。我應該參考《精通釣魚之技》第二卷多加了解牠們的習性。他還要我去薩雷提農場西方的釣魚地點，幫他釣起遺失的幸運釣魚帽。他說釣魚只要戴那頂帽子，肯定都會下雨。雖然感覺他在吹牛，不過我想就姑且一試吧。

original: I have read the second volume of Fishing Mastery. All of the fish I need to catch are most easily caught when it's raining in the warmer parts of Skyrim. Catfish, spadefish, and pygmy sunfish can only be caught in lakes. Pearlfish can be caught in both lakes and streams. He also asked me to help fish up his lucky fishing hat, lost at a fishing spot west of Sarethi Farm. He claims that it rains wherever he wears the hat when fishing. That sounds far-fetched, but I suppose I could use all the luck I can get.
string: 我讀了《精通釣魚之技》第二卷。只要在雨天前往天際省的溫暖區域，就能輕易抓到這次要釣的魚。鯰魚、燕魚和小日鱸只能在湖泊中抓到。隱魚則在湖泊和溪流都會出現。他還要我去薩雷提農場西邊的釣魚地點，幫他釣起遺失的幸運釣魚帽。他說釣魚只要戴那頂帽子，肯定都會下雨。雖然感覺他在吹牛，不過我想就姑且一試吧。

original: I've given Swims-In-Deep-Water all of the fish he requested as proof of completing his fishing challenge, as well as his lucky fishing hat. He rewarded me with an Argonian fishing rod, which will be useful when trying to catch large fish. He also handed me a sum of gold.
string: 我把深水泳客的幸運釣魚帽，連同他要求的所有魚類一起交給他，證明我完成了他的釣魚挑戰。他給了我一支亞龍人釣桿作為獎勵，這支釣桿很適合用來釣大魚。他也給了我一些金幣。

original: I've given Swims-In-Deep-Water all of the fish he requested as proof of completing his fishing challenge. I kept his lucky fishing hat to myself after telling him I couldn't find it. He rewarded me with an Argonian fishing rod, which will be useful when trying to catch large fish.
string: 我把深水泳客要求的所有魚類都交給他，證明我完成了他的釣魚挑戰。我把他的幸運釣魚帽據為己有，跟他說我沒找到。他給了我一支亞龍人釣桿作為獎勵，這支釣桿很適合用來釣大魚。

original: Fish up Swims-In-Deep-Water's lucky fishing hat
string: 釣起深水泳客的幸運釣魚帽
（選擇性）閱讀《精通釣魚之技》第二卷

original: Read the list of rainy weather fish

string: 釣魚系統追隨者閒置任務

original: Swims-In-Deep-Water has given me a list of fish I should catch to improve my fishing skills. I should read the note to see what I need to catch.
string: 深水泳客給了我一份魚類清單，要我捕捉上面的魚類來提升自己的釣魚技巧。我應該閱讀他給我的筆記，看看我要釣到哪些魚。

original: Swims-In-Deep-Water would like me to catch fish that can commonly be caught in streams and lakes in the warmer parts of Skyrim. Once I've caught one of each, I should return them to him. His field guide, Fishing Mastery, should provide details on each fish and how they can be caught. He mentioned that a copy is sitting on a shelf in the back room of the Riften Fishery.
string: 深水泳客想要我去捕捉天際省溫暖地區的溪流和湖泊常見的魚類。只要每種魚各抓到一隻後，我就該帶這些魚回去找他。他的野外指南《精通釣魚之技》提供了每一種魚的詳細資料和捕捉方式。他說過裂谷城漁業密室的架上就放了一本。

original: I read the first volume of Fishing Mastery, Swims-In-Deep-Water's field guide. All of the fish I need to catch can be caught in the warmer parts of Skyrim on a clear day. Goldfish and glassfish can only be caught in lakes, while pogfish are found in streams. Carp can be caught in both lakes and streams. I should be able to catch what I need by fishing of off the docks near the Riften Fishery, and along the river that leads to Ivarstead.
string: 我讀了深水泳客的野外指南《精通釣魚之技》第一卷。我要抓的所有魚都會在晴天時出現在天際省的溫暖地區。金魚和玻璃魚可以在湖泊中捕捉，而波哥魚會在溪流中出沒。鯉魚則會出現在湖泊和溪流中。我在裂谷城漁業附近的碼頭和流向紫杉鎮的河流應該能抓到我要的魚類

original: I've given Swims-In-Deep-Water all of the fish he requested as proof of completing his fishing challenge. In return, he gave me a sum of gold, as well as a key to the Riften Fishery.
string: 我把深水泳客要求的所有魚類都交給他，證明我完成了他的釣魚挑戰。他給了我一些金幣和裂谷城漁業的鑰匙作為獎勵。
（選擇性）閱讀《精通釣魚之技》第一卷

original: Read the list of fair weather fish
I received a hastily written letter from Viriya. I should read what it has to say.
string: 我收到薇利亞匆匆寫下的信。我應該讀讀信的內容。

original: Viriya received a letter from Jarl <Alias=Jarl> in Dawnstar. The frenzied mudcrabs have emerged once again. When the Dawnstar guard arrived, they were attacked by a spirit that caused them to flee in terror. Viriya is already on her way to Dawnstar and asked for my assistance. I should answer the call and return to the shore west of Dawnstar.
string: 薇利亞收到了晨星城<Alias=Jarl>領主的信。發狂泥沼蟹再次出沒。晨星城衛兵抵達時被靈體攻擊，讓他們害怕而逃。薇利亞正在前往晨星城的路上，並請我幫忙協助。我應該答應她並返回晨星城的西方海岸。

original: I have arrived once again at the shore west of Dawnstar. The signs of a recent battle scar the surrounding area where Viriya and a handful of guards have stood their ground against a mudcrab horde. As I approached, the frenzied mudcrabs began to emerge from the sea again. I should help Viriya and the guards defeat them.
string: 我再次抵達了晨星城西方的海岸。薇利亞和衛兵奮力對抗過泥沼蟹的地區四周一片滿目瘡痍。我一靠近，發狂泥沼蟹就再次從海裡出現。我應該要協助薇利亞和衛兵打敗牠們。

original: I've helped Viriya and the guards defeat a wave of frenzied mudcrabs, but more are coming. I should take a moment to prepare for the next assault.
string: 我協助薇利亞和衛兵打敗了一波發狂泥沼蟹，不過又有更多出現。我應該把握時間準備下一波攻勢。

original: Another wave of frenzied mudcrabs have emerged from the sea west of Dawnstar, this time more numerous than ever. We will need to fend them off once more.
string: 另一波發狂泥沼蟹從晨星城西方的海裡出現，這次數量比以往更多。我們必須再次擊退牠們。

original: After several hard-fought battles, the frenzied mudcrab attacks have stopped for now. We should regroup inside the shack nearby.
string: 經過幾場硬仗後，發狂泥沼蟹的攻勢終於停下來了。我們該去附近的小屋集結。

original: Now that we've regrouped after the battle, I should speak to Viriya inside the shack.
string: 趁著我們結束戰鬥後集結，我應該進小屋裡和薇利亞交談。

original: The guardian spirit of a massive emperor crab has materialized off the coast, along with a new wave of mudcrabs. The guardian spirit is too large to be harmed by normal means. However, I should be able to use the catapults the guards have put in position nearby. The mudcrabs seem to have collected the flaming pots from the wrecked wagon near the shack. I will have to recover them from the mudcrabs and use them to fire the catapults at the guardian spirit.
string: 巨型帝王蟹的守護靈在海上現身，帶著新的一波發狂的泥沼蟹來襲。守護靈太過龐大，普通的方法傷不了牠。不過，我應該可以用衛兵在附近部署的投石器。泥沼蟹似乎從小屋附近的馬車殘骸收集了燃燒罐。我必須想辦法從牠們取得燃燒罐後，用來朝守護靈發射投石器。

original: Using the catapults, I managed to vanquish the emperor crab guardian spirit. The swarms of frenzied mudcrabs have come to an end. I should speak to Viriya now that the battle is over.
string: 我奮力用投石器消滅了帝王蟹守護靈。發狂泥沼蟹群就此落幕。既然戰鬥結束了，我應該去告訴薇利亞。

original: In the aftermath of the battle, Viriya thanked me for helping defeat the guardian spirit of the emperor crab. The guards must tend to their wounds, and Viriya will make the long journey back to Riften. The emperor crab guardian spirit and its horde of frenzied mudcrabs should no longer threaten the people of Dawnstar. I should travel to Dawnstar and inform the Jarl that the battle was a success.
string: 戰鬥結束後，薇利亞感謝我幫忙打敗了帝王蟹的守護靈。衛兵的傷口必須接受治療，而薇利亞將長途跋涉回去裂谷城。帝王蟹守護靈跟發狂泥沼蟹群不會再危及晨星城的居民了。我應該前往晨星城，告訴領主這場戰鬥大獲全勝。

original: In the aftermath of the battle, Viriya thanked me for helping defeat the guardian spirit of the emperor crab. The guards must tend to their wounds, and Viriya will make the long journey back to Riften. The emperor crab guardian spirit and its horde of frenzied mudcrabs should no longer threaten the people of Dawnstar. I traveled to Dawnstar and informed the Jarl, who rewarded me for my efforts.
string: 戰鬥結束後，薇利亞感謝我幫忙打敗了帝王蟹的守護靈。衛兵的傷口必須接受治療，而薇利亞將長途跋涉回去裂谷城。帝王蟹守護靈跟發狂泥沼蟹群不會再危及晨星城的居民了。我返回晨星城向領主回報，領取我應得的獎勵。
閱讀薇利亞匆匆寫下的信件

original: Return to the shore west of Dawnstar
string: 返回晨星城西方的海岸

original: Regroup with Viriya inside the shack
string: 和薇利亞在小屋內集合

original: Fire the catapults at the Emperor Crab Guardian Spirit (<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CrabMQ4CatapultCount>/<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CrabMQ4CatapultTotal>)
string: 朝帝王蟹守護靈發射投石器（<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CrabMQ4CatapultCount>/<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CrabMQ4CatapultTotal>）

original: Fire catapults at the Emperor Crab Guardian Spirit using flaming pots (<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CrabMQ4CatapultCount>/<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CrabMQ4CatapultTotal>)
string: 用燃燒罐朝帝王蟹守護靈發射投石器（<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CrabMQ4CatapultCount>/<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CrabMQ4CatapultTotal>）

original: Obtain flaming pots from the frenzied mudcrabs
string: 從發狂的泥沼蟹身上取得燃燒罐

original: I met Viriya, one of the employees at the Riften Fishery. She handed me a bounty letter and seemed rather frustrated. I should see what it has to say.
string: 我遇到了裂谷城漁業的員工薇利亞。她一臉沮喪地交給我一封懸賞信。我應該讀讀信的內容。

original: Viriya at the Riften Fishery has been conducting research on breeding mudcrabs to harvest their meat, much like fish. She has issued a bounty for someone to obtain a juvenile mudcrab for her studies, but the last person to accept the bounty never returned. I should speak to her when I am ready to take over the bounty.
string: 裂谷城漁業的薇利亞在進行繁殖泥沼蟹的研究，希望能像養魚一樣採收蟹肉。她發布懸賞找人幫捕捉研究所需的泥沼蟹幼蟹，不過上一個接下懸賞的人並沒有回來。等我準備好接下懸賞時，我應該去找她聊聊。

original: Viriya at the Riften Fishery has been conducting research on mudcrabs in the hopes that they could be more easily bred and harvested, much like fish. She has issued a bounty for someone to obtain a juvenile mudcrab for her studies, but the last person to accept the bounty never returned. I should try fishing one up myself in the streams and lakes in the temperate parts of Skyrim. One lake in particular is known to be teeming with mudcrab, which Viriya mentioned was west of Broken Fang Cave.
string: 裂谷城漁業的薇利亞在進行泥沼蟹的研究，希望能像養魚一樣，更輕鬆地繁殖及採收蟹肉。她發布懸賞找人幫捕捉研究所需的泥沼蟹幼蟹，不過上一個接下懸賞的人並沒有回來。我應該去天際省溫帶區域的溪流和湖泊試著捕捉看看。薇利亞曾提過，斷牙洞穴西邊有一座湖泊盛產泥沼蟹。

original: I turned a juvenile mudcrab over to Viriya for her research. In return, she gave me a key to the Riften Fishery so that I may enter whenever I need to.
string: 我把泥沼蟹幼蟹交給薇利亞進行研究。她給了我裂谷城漁業的鑰匙作為答謝，讓我能自由進出。

original: Obtain a juvenile mudcrab for Viriya
string: 為薇利亞捕捉泥沼蟹幼蟹

original: Speak to Viriya about taking over the bounty
string: 和薇利亞談論接下懸賞的事
閱讀徵求公告：釣魚私人指導
閱讀徵求公告：海鮮大餐

original: Ask Viriya about additional fishing bounties around Skyrim
string: 向薇利亞詢問天際省各地的其他釣魚懸賞

original: Calcelmo has heard fishermen's tales of a strange apparatus outside of Bronze Water Cave. He believes it is an ancient Dwemer mechanism of unknown purpose, waiting to be brought to life. I should investigate the area and see if there might be any way to trigger it.
string: 卡塞莫聽說漁民間流傳銅水洞穴外有奇怪的儀器。他認為應該是功能不明的古老鍛莫機關，等待重新運轉。我該去調查周遭區域，看看有沒有辦法啟動機關。

original: I've arrived at the entrance of Bronze Water Cave. The fishermen that once fished here seem to have left behind a journal. It may contain a clue for activating the mechanisms nearby.
string: 我來到了銅水洞穴的入口。來這裡釣魚的漁民好像把一本日記留在這裡了。或許裡面有啟動附近機關的線索。

original: The fishermen at Bronze Water Cave saw faint glowing objects at the bottom of the lake near Bronze Water Cave, but they were unable to fish them up. They believed that a fishing rod of Dwarven make might be needed to retrieve them. They recently left for Alftand Ruined Tower, where the schematics for such a rod might be located.
string: 銅水洞穴的漁民在銅水洞穴附近的湖底發現一個散發微光的物體，不過他們都釣不起來。他們認為可能得用矮人做的釣竿才釣得起來。他們最近前往精靈之牙遺跡塔，或許那裡會有釣竿的設計圖。

original: I've found the schematics for the Dwarven fishing rod that might be used to catch the glowing objects that lie below the water's surface outside of Bronze Water Cave. I should return it to Calcelmo so that he can construct it.
string: 我找到了矮人釣竿的設計圖，這把釣竿或許能釣起銅水洞穴外水底的發光物體。我該把設計圖帶回去給卡塞莫，這樣他才能製作。

original: I've given Calcelmo the schematics for the Dwarven fishing rod. I now need to wait for him to construct it. I should ask him about it at this time tomorrow.
string: 我把矮人釣竿的設計圖交給了卡塞莫。現在我得等他製作。我明天這個時候應該去問問他做好了沒。

original: Calcelmo should be finished constructing the Dwarven fishing rod from the schematic I discovered.
string: 卡塞莫應該已經根據我發現的設計圖，把矮人釣竿做好了。

original: Calcelmo has given me the Dwarven fishing rod. I should cast it at the fishing spots near Bronze Water Cave so that I might be able to catch the objects that might activate the mechanisms near the cave.
string: 卡塞莫把矮人釣竿交給了我。我應該去銅水洞穴附近釣魚地點拋竿，如果能把物體釣起來，或許就能啟動山洞附近的機關。

original: I cast the Dwarven fishing rod into the water near Bronze Water Cave, and caught an aetherium dynamo core. An empty socket on the pedestal nearby appears to be shaped to hold such a core. I'll have to insert the dynamo core to bring the rest of the mechanism to life.
string: 我在銅水洞穴附近的水域拋出矮人釣竿，釣到一個神光水晶動力核。附近的台座有一個凹槽，形狀跟核心吻合。我得把動力核放進去，讓機關恢復運轉。

original: I cast the Dwarven fishing rod into the water near Bronze Water Cave, and caught an aetherium dynamo core. An empty socket on the pedestal nearby appears to be shaped to hold such a core. I'll have to insert the dynamo core to bring the rest of the mechanism to life.
string: 我在銅水洞穴附近的水域拋出矮人釣竿，釣到一個神光水晶動力核。附近的台座有一個凹槽，形狀跟核心吻合。我得把動力核放進去，讓機關恢復運轉。

original: After using the Dwarven fishing rod near Bronze Water Cave and powering up an ancient mechanism using aetherium dynamo cores, a pedestal rose from beneath the surface revealing a submerged chest.
string: 在銅水洞穴附近用矮人釣竿釣起神光水晶動力核，並恢復遠古機關的動力後，表面下方升起了一個台座，露出藏在底下的箱子。

original: Investigate the entrance of Bronze Water Cave
Find the Dwarven fishing rod schematic in Alftand Ruined Tower
string: 前往精靈之牙遺跡塔找出矮人釣竿的設計圖

original: Bring the Dwarven fishing rod schematic to Calcelmo
string: 把矮人釣竿的設計圖帶給卡塞莫

original: Wait 24 hours for Calcelmo to build the fishing rod
string: 等待24小時直到卡塞莫做好釣竿

original: Use the dwarven fishing rod to catch the strange objects near Bronze Water Cave (<Global=ccBGSSSE001_MDDLeft>/<Global=ccBGSSSE001_MDDTotal>)
string: 用矮人釣竿釣起銅水洞穴附近的奇怪物體（<Global=ccBGSSSE001_MDDLeft>/<Global=ccBGSSSE001_MDDTotal>）

original: Insert the aetherium dynamo core into the dynamo actuator (<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CoresLeft>/<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CoresTotal>)
string: 將神光水晶動力核放進動力推進器（<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CoresLeft>/<Global=ccBGSSSE001_CoresTotal>）

original: I received a letter from Mila Valentia. I should read what it has to say.
string: 我收到米拉．巴倫西亞寄來的信。我應該讀讀信的內容。

original: Mila Valentia in Whiterun wrote me a letter saying that the goldfish I brought her needs a companion. I should bring her another goldfish whenever the opportunity arises.
string: 白漫城的米拉．巴倫西亞寫了一封信給我，說我給她的金魚需要同伴。我應該把握機會再幫她抓一條金魚。

original: I brought Mila another goldfish. I should follow her to the trough where she will keep them.
string: 我帶了另一條金魚給米拉。我應該跟著她前往養魚的水槽。

original: Mila's goldfish now has a new companion. In exchange, she gave me a note and a key. I should see what the note has to say.
string: 米拉的金魚現在有了新同伴。她給了我一張紙條和一把鑰匙。我應該看看紙條上的內容。

original: Mila's note mentions that she keeps "treasure" in a secret hiding place where she likes to play behind Dragonsreach. It's likely just things she's found around Whiterun, but I should check just to be certain.
string: 米拉的字條提到，她把「寶藏」藏在秘密基地，也就是她喜歡在龍臨堡後方玩耍的地點。她所謂的寶藏應該只是她在白漫城四處收集的物品，不過保險起見我還是會稍微檢查一下。

original: I brought Mila Valentia another goldfish. In exchange, she gave me the key to her treasure box at her hiding spot behind Dragonsreach. I was surprised to discover that she has collected a set of rare alchemy ingredients.
string: 我又給了米拉．巴倫西亞一條金魚，她把自己在龍臨堡後方秘密基地的藏寶箱鑰匙送給我作為回報。我很驚訝她居然收集了一套稀有的煉金術材料。

original: Find another goldfish for Mila Valentia
string: 為米拉．巴倫西亞再找一條金魚

original: Read the letter from Mila Valentia
string: 閱讀米拉．巴倫西亞的信

original: Swims-In-Deep-Water has given me a fishing bounty. I should read what the bounty letter has to say.
string: 深水泳客交給我一項釣魚懸賞。我應該閱讀懸賞信的內容。

original: <Alias=Innkeeper> is running low on fresh fish for <Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper> patrons and has put out a bounty to replenish <Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper> stock of brook bass.
string: <Alias=Innkeeper>供應<Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper>顧客的新鮮魚肉快用完了，因此發出懸賞，要找人補充<Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper>的溪鱸庫存。

original: <Alias=Innkeeper> is running low on fresh fish for <Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper> patrons and has put out a bounty to replenish <Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper> stock of salmon.
string: <Alias=Innkeeper>供應<Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper>顧客的新鮮魚肉快用完了，因此發出懸賞，要找人補充<Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper>的鮭魚庫存。

original: <Alias=Innkeeper> is running low on fresh fish for <Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper> patrons and has put out a bounty to replenish <Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper> stock of catfish.
string: <Alias=Innkeeper>供應<Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper>顧客的新鮮魚肉快用完了，因此發出懸賞，要找人補充<Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper>的鯰魚庫存。

original: <Alias=Innkeeper> is running low on fresh fish for <Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper> patrons and has put out a bounty to replenish <Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper> stock of arctic grayling.
string: <Alias=Innkeeper>供應<Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper>顧客的新鮮魚肉快用完了，因此發出懸賞，要找人補充<Alias.PronounPosObj=Innkeeper>的北極茴魚庫存。

original: I supplied <Alias=Innkeeper> with the fish <Alias.Pronoun=Innkeeper> needed.
<Alias=Innkeeper> has died, leaving me unable to fulfill the bounty.
Read Bounty: Supply of Brook Bass
Read Bounty: Supply of Arctic Grayling
Lynea in Markarth is in search of a fishing tutor. I should let her know when I feel up to the task. Her bounty letter said that she can be found waiting in the Silver-Blood Inn.
string: 馬卡斯城的利尼亞正在找釣魚私人指導。等我有信心教導她時，應該要讓她知道。她的懸賞信提到她會在銀血客棧等候。

original: I spoke to Lynea about fishing lessons, and she agreed to meet me on the docks near the Warrens in Markarth when she is ready to begin.
string: 我和利尼亞提到了釣魚課程，而她同意在準備好後，前往馬卡斯城窩棚附近的碼頭與我會面。

original: I met Lynea on the docks near the Warrens. I should catch several fish in order to demonstrate proper fishing technique.
string: 我在窩棚附近的碼頭遇到利尼亞。我應該抓幾條魚展現我的釣魚技巧。

original: I caught several fish while Lynea watched on. I should speak with her now that the lesson is complete.
string: 我在利尼亞的監督下釣到幾條魚。既然課程已經完成了，我現在應該和她聊聊。

original: Lynea seemed to appreciate her fishing lesson, and gave me her amulet of Dibella as payment.
string: 利尼亞好像很滿意釣魚課程，還把蒂貝拉護符當作給我的酬勞。

original: Speak to Lynea about private fishing lessons
string: 和利尼亞聊聊私人釣魚課程的事

original: Meet Lynea on the docks near the Warrens
string: 在窩棚附近的碼頭和利尼亞見面

original: The Jarl of Windhelm has put out a bounty on a monsterous horker known as Fangtusk, which has been terrorizing fishermen north of Hollyfrost Farm. Fishermen have learned that it seems to enjoy arctic grayling above all other fish. I should obtain an arctic grayling and leave it near its feeding grounds in order to lure it out.
string: 風舵城的領主發出懸賞，要找人除掉名為獠牙的恐怖海象，以免冬青霜農場北方的漁民生命受到威脅。漁民發現牠特別喜歡吃北極茴魚。我應該去捕捉北極茴魚放在牠的覓食地區附近，將牠引誘出來。

original: I've placed an arctic grayling at Fangtusk's feeding grounds, which seems to have lured it out. I can now slay it in order to rid the area of its hostility.
string: 我在獠牙的覓食區域放置了北極茴魚，成功引誘牠現身。現在我要把牠殺死，不讓牠繼續危害當地的安全。

original: I have slain Fangtusk. During the battle, I discovered that the rumors about its ability to drain the life of those around it are true. I should inspect it to learn what, if anything, has granted it this unnatural ability.
string: 我殺死了獠牙。在戰鬥期間，我發現牠會吸收周圍人類生命的傳聞是真的。我應該檢查牠的身體，找出到底是什麼東西賦予牠這種超自然的力量。

original: After slaying Fangtusk, I discovered the remains of a vampire inside its gut, along with an enchanted vampiric ring. I should show the Jarl's steward the ring as proof that the deed is done.
string: 殺死獠牙後，我發現牠的內臟裡有吸血鬼的殘骸，還有一只附魔的吸血鬼指環。我應該把指環拿給領主的總管看，證明我完成了懸賞任務。

original: I showed the vampiric ring taken from Fangtusk to Jarl of Windhelm's steward, who rewarded me for fulfilling the bounty.
string: 我給風舵城領主的總管看了我從獠牙身上取出的吸血鬼指環，並從他手上拿到完成懸賞的獎勵。

original: Place an arctic grayling at Fangtusk's feeding grounds
string: 在獠牙的覓食區域放置北極茴魚

original: Viriya has entrusted me with another task directly from her. I should read what her note has to say.
string: 薇利亞直接委託我執行另一項任務。我應該讀讀她紙條上的內容。

original: An unexplained swarm of aggressive mudcrabs have recently begun attacking fishermen at a fishing shack on the coast west of Dawnstar. Viriya has tasked me with eliminating them in order to make the coasts safe once more.
string: 最近有一群具攻擊性的泥沼蟹因為不明原因開始攻擊晨星城西方釣魚小屋的漁民。薇利亞要我去消滅牠們，讓海岸恢復安全。

original: I've arrived at the fishing shack west of Dawnstar. As I approached, frenzied mudcrabs attacked from the sea. I'll have to defeat them in order to make this area safe again.
string: 我抵達了晨星城西方的釣魚小屋。我一靠近，發狂的泥沼蟹就從海裡發動攻擊。我必須擊敗牠們，才能讓這個區域恢復安全。

original: I've defeated the swarm of frenzied mudcrabs. I should investigate the area to see if I can discover why the mudcrabs in this area have become so aggressive.
string: 我擊敗了一群發狂的泥沼蟹。我應該調查這個區域，看看能不能發現這裡的泥沼蟹為什麼攻擊性這麼強。

original: I discovered that Seviur, a novice necromancer, was practicing his arts on the coastline. He cast a powerful illusion spell to bring mudcrabs to the shore where he repeatedly killed and resurrected them in order to hone his abilities. Aggressive mudcrabs not under Seviur's control soon began rising from the sea to attack. Eventually, Seviur was slain, but it seems that the frenzied mudcrab attacks have not stopped. I must now quell this latest mudcrab attack on the coastline.
string: 我發現死靈術士新手瑟維爾在海岸邊練習咒語。他施展強烈的幻術吸引泥沼蟹到岸邊，接著重複殺死泥沼蟹再讓牠們復活，只為了鍛鍊自己的技能。具有攻擊性的泥沼蟹擺脫瑟維爾的控制後，很快開始從海裡發動攻擊。最後瑟維爾被殺死，但是發狂的泥沼蟹還是沒有停止攻擊。現在我必須阻止近日泥沼蟹在海岸的攻擊行為。

original: I discovered that Seviur, a novice necromancer, was practicing his arts on the coastline. He cast a powerful illusion spell to bring mudcrabs to the shore where he repeatedly killed and resurrected them in order to hone his abilities. Aggressive mudcrabs not under Seviur's control soon began rising from the sea to attack. Eventually, Seviur was slain, but it seems that the frenzied mudcrab attacks have not stopped. Now that the mudcrabs have been defeated, I should return to Viriya.

I returned to Viriya and told her about the mudcrab swarm and the necromancer who stirred them into a frenzy. As payment, she gave me an Alik'ri fishing rod, which should be very helpful when trying to catch smaller fish.
string: 我回去找薇利亞，並告訴她泥沼蟹群是因為死靈術士的緣故才會發狂。她給了我阿里喀爾的釣竿作為報酬，應該很適合用來釣小型魚類。

original: Read the letter on mudcrab attacks
string: 閱讀有關泥沼蟹攻擊的信

original: Investigate the area near the fishing shack west of Dawnstar
string: 調查晨星城西方釣魚小屋附近的區域

original: Discover the origin of the frenzied mudcrabs
string: 發現泥沼蟹發狂的原因

original: Skyrim's waters are teeming with life just below the surface. With enough skill and a bit of luck, I could catch a few fish that would make for a hearty meal. While there are many places to fish throughout Skyrim, I've heard rumors of an excellent fishing spot at a camp near the Guardian Stones just south of Riverwood.
string: 天際省的水下處處充滿生機。只要有足夠的技巧和一點運氣，我就能釣幾條魚飽餐一頓。雖然天際省到處都可以釣魚，不過我聽說有座營地是釣魚的好地點，就在河木鎮南方的守護者之石附近。

original: I've found the fishing spot near the Guardian Stones. I should try my hand at fishing here to see what I can catch. The fisherman who camps here seems to have a copy of Line and Lure nearby. I might learn a few things by flipping through it.
string: 我找到守護者之石附近的釣魚地點了。我應該在這裡試試手氣，看我能釣到什麼魚。在這裡紮營的漁夫好像在附近放了一本《釣線和誘餌》。翻一翻或許能學到一點知識。

original: Using my fishing rod and supplies, I managed to make my first of many successful catches.
string: 我總算用釣竿和用具成功釣起第一條魚。

original: Visit the fishing camp south of Riverwood
string: 前往河木鎮南方的釣魚營地

original: Catch a fish using fishing supplies

Gisli in Solitude has requested a huge seafood meal. The innkeeper does not stock everything she would like, so I'll need to collect all of the food in Gisli's bounty letter in order to set a table for her on the second floor of the Winking Skeever.
string: 獨孤城的吉斯莉要求要吃一頓海鮮大餐。老闆並沒有她想要吃的所有食材，因此我必須收齊吉斯莉懸賞信裡所有的食材，才能為她在眨眼惡鼠的二樓擺出滿桌佳餚。

original: I have set a table for Gisli at the Winking Skeever in Solitude. I should wait for her to take her seat and check in once she's finished dining.
string: 我在獨孤城的眨眼惡鼠為吉斯莉準備大餐。我應該等她入座，並等她用完餐時現身領取報酬。

original: Gisli should be finished dining by now. I should check the table for her payment.
string: 吉斯莉現在應該已經用完餐了。我應該去她餐桌旁領取報酬。

original: I prepared a huge seafood feast for Gisli in Solitude. Judging by the letter of thanks and the coin purse left on her empty plate, she seemed satisfied with her meal.
string: 我在獨孤城為吉斯莉準備了海鮮大餐。從她留在空盤上的感謝函和錢包看來，她對這頓大餐似乎很滿意。

original: Obtain a pair of steamed crab legs
Obtain a bowl of crab stew
Wait for Gisli to take her seat
Wait an hour for Gisli to finish dining
string: 等待一小時直到吉斯莉用完餐

original: Check Gisli's table at the Winking Skeever
string: 檢查吉斯莉在眨眼惡鼠坐的餐桌

original: Set a table for Gisli at the Winking Skeever
string: 在眨眼惡鼠為吉斯莉準備大餐

original: I've received a letter from Viriya. I should read what it has to say.
string: 我收到薇利亞寄來的信。我應該讀讀信的內容。

original: Viriya is planning to leave the Riften Fishery and start her own market stall in the Grand Plaza specializing in her passion, mudcrab. I should see if I can help her by obtaining all of the supplies she will need to build her stall so she can move on to her next venture.
string: 薇利亞打算離開裂谷城漁業，到大廣場經營自己的攤位，專門販售她最愛的泥沼蟹。我應該想辦法幫她取得建造攤位所需的材料，讓她可以展開自己的事業。

original: I have given Viriya everything she needs in order to build her own market stall in the Grand Plaza. I should wait for her to set it up.
string: 我把薇利亞在大廣場搭建市場攤位所需的材料都交給了她。我應該等待她把攤位建好。

original: Viriya should have her market stall in the Grand Plaza set up by now. I should pay her a visit when I have the chance.
string: 薇利亞在大廣場的市場攤位現在應該已經開張了。我應該找機會去拜訪她。

original: I spoke to Viriya at her new market stall, where she has started a new chapter in her life beyond the Riften Fishery. I'm glad she was able to realize her dream of farming and selling mudcrab meat.
string: 薇利亞開了新的市場攤位，展開從裂谷城漁業離職後的新生活。和她聊過天後，我很慶幸她能實現自己的夢想，開始養殖和販售泥沼蟹肉。

original: Bring the building supplies to Viriya
string: 把建築材料帶給薇利亞

original: Wait 24 hours for Viriya to set up her market stall
string: 等待24小時直到薇利亞建好自己的市場攤位

original: Swims-In-Deep-Water has given me a fishing bounty. I should read what the bounty letter has to say.
string: 深水泳客交給我一項釣魚懸賞。我應該閱讀懸賞信的內容。

original: Jarl <Alias=Jarl> has put out a bounty to clean up the waterways in and around <Alias.PronounPosObj=Jarl> city. I'll need to fish up <Global=ccBGSSSE001_RadiantObjTotal> items from the water within <Alias=Town> in order to claim the bounty.
string: <Alias=Jarl>領主發出了懸賞，要求清理<Alias.PronounPosObj=Jarl>城內和四周的水道。我必須從<Alias=Town>內的水域釣起<Global=ccBGSSSE001_RadiantObjTotal>項物品才能領取懸賞。

original: I've fished up enough items from <Alias=Town>'s waters to complete the bounty. I should speak to the Jarl's steward, <Alias=Steward>, to claim my reward.
string: 我從<Alias=Town>的水域釣出足以完成懸賞的物品。我應該去找領主的總管<Alias=Steward>聊聊，領取我的獎勵。

original: I've fished up enough items from <Alias=Town>'s waters to complete the bounty. I should speak to Jarl <Alias=Jarl> to claim my reward.
string: 我從<Alias=Town>的水域釣出足以完成懸賞的物品。我應該去找<Alias=Jarl>領主聊聊，領取我的獎勵。

original: I claimed the reward for helping clean up the waters in and around <Alias=Town>.
string: 我領取了幫忙清理<Alias=Town>內和四周水域的獎勵。

original: Fish up <Global=ccBGSSSE001_RadiantObjTotal> items from the water in <Alias=Town> (<Global=ccBGSSSE001_RadiantObjCount>/<Global=ccBGSSSE001_RadiantObjTotal>)
To become more skilled at fishing, I should visit the Riften Fishery and speak to those who work there. In particular, Viriya and Swims-In-Deep-Water are rumored to be highly knowledgeable.
string: 為了提升釣魚的技術，我應該去一趟裂谷城漁業，和那裡的員工聊聊，尤其是薇利亞和深水泳客，據說他們的知識非常淵博。

original: Viriya and Swims-In-Deep-Water are experienced fishermen employed by the Riften Fishery. I should speak to them about how I might be able to help, and improve my fishing abilities in the process.
string: 薇利亞和深水泳客都是裂谷城漁業裡經驗豐富的漁民。我應該跟他們交談，問問我能幫上什麼忙，以及在過程中改善我的釣魚技能。

original: I've introduced myself to both of the most experienced fishermen at the Riften Fishery, with the hope that their assignments will help me hone my skill in fishing.
string: 我向裂谷城漁業兩位經驗最豐富的漁民自我介紹，希望他們派給我的任務可以幫助我鍛鍊釣魚技巧。

original: I received a letter from Swims-In-Deep-Water about fishing challenges. I should see what it has to say.
string: 我收到深水泳客關於釣魚挑戰的信。我應該讀讀信的內容。

original: Swims-In-Deep-Water is ready to resume my fishing challenges. I should speak with him when I return to the Riften Fishery.
string: 深水泳客準備好繼續派給我釣魚挑戰了。等我回裂谷城漁業，應該去找他聊聊。

original: Swims-In-Deep-Water has given me another fishing challenge. I should read the list he gave me to see what I will need to catch.
string: 深水泳客給了我另一項釣魚挑戰。我應該閱讀他給我的清單，看看我要釣到哪些魚。

original: The fish that Swims-In-Deep-Water has tasked me with catching are commonly found in the freezing waters of Skyrim's snow-capped landscapes. Once I've caught one of each, I should return them to him. I can consult the third volume of Fishing Mastery to learn more about my quarry.
string: 深水泳客交給我的任務，是要我捕捉會在天際省冰天雪地的寒冷水域出沒的魚類。每種魚各抓到一隻後，我必須帶這些魚回去找他。我可以參考《精通釣魚之技》第三卷吸收更多知識。

original: I have read the third volume of Fishing Mastery. All of the fish I need to catch to complete the challenge can be caught at fishing spots wherever there is freezing water near snow and ice. The docks of Windhelm, the water near Dawnstar, and the small lake near Nightgate Inn were mentioned as places I could try casting my line.
string: 我讀了《精通釣魚之技》第三卷。只要前往雪地附近的寒冷水域，就能捕捉完成挑戰所需的各種魚類。書上說我可以去風舵城的碼頭、晨星城附近的水域、夜扉客棧附近的小湖碰碰運氣。

original: I've given Swims-In-Deep-Water all of the fish he requested as proof of completing his fishing challenge.
string: 我把深水泳客要求的所有魚類都交給他，證明我完成了他的釣魚挑戰。

original: Read the letter on fishing work

string: （選擇性）閱讀《精通釣魚之技》第三卷

original: Read the list of arctic fish

A fisherman named Brutius is challenging anyone who would face him to a fishing contest. He requires his challengers to make a wager on who the better fisher is. If I want to test my fishing abilities against him, I should meet him on the docks in Morthal.
string: 有個叫布魯提斯的漁民在找釣魚比賽的對手。他要求挑戰者下注賭誰比較會釣魚。如果我想要跟他比釣魚技術，我就得去墨索爾城的碼頭跟他見面。

original: I placed a bet with Brutius that I could best him in a fishing contest. He marked where we will have the contest on my map. I should meet him there when I am ready to face him.
string: 我和布魯提斯打賭能在釣魚比賽中打敗他。他把競賽地點標示在我的地圖上。等我做好準備，應該去那裡和他見面。

original: It seems that the fishing contest was nothing more than a trap. Brutius and several other wizards ambushed me as soon as I arrived at the location for the fishing contest. I will have to defeat them before I can find any answers.
string: 原來釣魚比賽只是個陷阱。布魯提斯和其他幾名巫師躲起來埋伏，趁我抵達釣魚比賽的地點時一擁而上。我必須打敗他們才能找出真相。

original: I defeated Brutius and the rest of his ambushers. I should search him to see if he kept a journal of his misdeeds.
string: 我打敗了布魯提斯和他剩下的伏兵。我應該搜他身，看看他有沒有記錄自己惡行的日記。

original: I defeated Brutius, who turned out to be a wizard disguised as a fisherman. I wonder what other secrets he might have been keeping. I should search him to see if he kept a journal.
string: 我打敗了布魯提斯，這傢伙是個假扮成漁民的巫師。不知道他身上還有哪些秘密。我應該搜他身，看看他身上有沒有日記。

original: On Brutius's body, I found a journal. I should read it to discover what secrets he's been keeping.
string: 我在布魯提斯身上找到一本日記。應該讀一下，看能不能找出他的秘密。

original: It seems that Brutius was a wizard that has been luring unsuspecting fisherman into the woods under the guise of a fishing contest, only to slay and rob them. Of note is an enchanted ring that he recently lost in the river at the fishing spot he lured his victims. I might be able to claim it if I try fishing there myself.
string: 巫師布魯提斯一直假借著釣魚比賽的名義，將毫無防備的漁民誘騙到森林中殺死再奪取對方的財物。重點是，最近他弄丟了一只附魔指環，掉進他誘騙受害者的釣魚地點附近的河裡。如果我去當地釣魚，或許有機會能釣到。

original: Tamriel is a better place without Brutius preying upon the citizens of Morthal. I also managed to fish up the Warlock's Ring, the ring Bruitus lost at the spot near the river where he lured his victims.
string: 布魯提斯無法再對墨索爾城的居民下手後，泰姆瑞爾變得更好了。我也設法釣起了這名巫師的指環，也就是布魯提斯在誘騙受害者的河邊附近弄丟的那只戒指。

original: Talk to Brutius in Morthal about a fishing contest
string: 到墨索爾城和布魯提斯談談釣魚比賽

original: Meet Brutius at the fishing spot
string: 和布魯提斯在釣魚地點見面
釣起布魯提斯遺失的指環

original: Swims-In-Deep-Water has given me another fishing challenge. I should read the list he gave me to see what I will need to catch.
string: 深水泳客給了我另一項釣魚挑戰。我應該閱讀他給我的清單，看看我要釣到哪些魚。

original: For my final challenge, the fish I am to catch are both rare and found in locations all over Skyrim. The fifth volume of Fishing Mastery has details on where, and how, to catch them. I should return them to Swims-In-Deep-Water once I've caught them all.
string: 我的最後一項挑戰，是要釣分布天際省各地的罕見魚類。《精通釣魚之技》第五卷中詳細記載了捕捉的地點和方法。等我全部都釣到後，我應該回去找深水泳客。

original: For my final challenge, the fish I am to catch are both rare and found in locations all over Skyrim. Angelfish can be found in temperate lakes, and can only be caught with an Alik'ri fishing rod. The lyretail anthias can be caught in temperate streams with the Alik'ri rod as well. Anglers are only caught in freezing waters using the Argonian fishing rod. Finally, scorpion fish are found underground. Like the angler, scorpion fish can only be caught by using the Argonian fishing rod.
string: 我的最後一項挑戰要捕捉分布天際省各地的罕見魚類。神仙魚會在溫帶湖泊出沒，只能用阿里喀爾的釣竿捕捉。絲鰭擬花鮨會在溫帶溪流生存，一樣只能用阿里喀爾的釣竿捕捉。燈籠魚只能用亞龍人釣竿在寒凍水域捕捉。最後，獅子魚會在地底出沒。和燈籠魚一樣，獅子魚只能用亞龍人釣竿捕捉。

original: I've completed Swims-In-Deep-Water's final fishing challenge, designating me a legendary fisherman. He granted me the Fang of Haynekhtnamet, an exquisite Argonian dagger, as a reward.
string: 我完成了深水泳客給我的最後一項釣魚挑戰，成為他認可的傳奇漁夫。作為獎勵，她給了我一把精緻的亞龍人匕首：黑涅赫納美龍之牙。
（選擇性）閱讀《精通釣魚之技》第五卷

original: Read the list of rare fish
Uncommon and rare fish can be caught more easily at dawn and dusk.
string: 清晨和傍晚比較容易釣到罕見的稀有魚類。

original: Different types of fish can be caught in temperate lakes and streams, in the rain, in freezing waters, and deep within flooded caverns and mines.
string: 溫帶湖泊和溪流、雨天、寒冷水域、淹水洞穴和礦坑深處能捕到的魚類型都不同。

original: Use specialized rods to catch the rarest fish.
string: 用特殊釣竿釣最稀有的魚。

original: Anyone who wants to become more skilled at fishing may seek out the guidance of experienced fishermen who work at the Riften Fishery.
string: 想要精進釣魚技術的人會去裂谷城漁業，尋找有經驗的漁民指導。

original: Ripples on the surface when your line hits the water means that fish are nearby.
string: 釣線接觸水面時只要出現漣漪，就表示附近有魚。

original: You can't place aggressive fish inside this fish tank.
string: 你不能把有攻擊性的魚類放進這個魚缸。

original: You can now create new equipment at forges.
string: 你現在可以在熔爐鍛造新裝備。

original:
Use fishing supplies to begin fishing. You can find fishing supplies near water in cities, towns, campsites, and many other places. You must have a fishing rod equipped in order to fish.

While fishing, press [Activate] to reel in your line. Reeling when there is a strong pull on your line will reel in your catch.

Ripples on the surface when casting your line are from nearby fish. If the water is calm when you cast your line, there are no more fish to catch. Fish will return to the fishing spot in a day's time.

You can catch more fish, and increase the chances of catching more elusive fish, at dawn and dusk.
string:
使用釣魚用具即可開始釣魚。你可以在城鎮、營地和其他許多地方的水域附近找到釣魚用具。

釣魚時，按[Activate]收線。釣魚線大力抽動時收線，就能把上鉤的魚拉回。

丟出釣魚線後，水面上的漣漪代表附近的魚。如果丟出釣魚線後水面很平靜，表示無魚可捕。魚群會在一天後回歸釣魚地點。

黎明和黃昏時能釣到更多魚，也有更高機率釣到少見的魚。

original: What do you want to do?

string: 在地圖上新增釣魚地點
從地圖上移除釣魚地點

string: 使用其他東西時無法釣魚。

original: Large fish put here will be placed inside the fish tank.
string: 放在這裡的大魚會被放進魚缸。

original: You cannot fish while in the air.
You reeled in your line too early.

string: 你需要燃燒罐才能使用。

original:
Use fishing supplies to begin fishing. You can find fishing supplies near water in cities, towns, campsites, and many other places. You must have a fishing rod equipped in order to fish.

While fishing, press [Activate] to reel in your line. Reeling when there is a strong pull on your line will reel in your catch.

Ripples on the surface when casting your line are from nearby fish. If the water is calm when you cast your line, there are no more fish to catch. Fish will return to the fishing spot in a day's time.

You can catch more fish, and increase the chances of catching more elusive fish, at dawn and dusk.
string:
使用釣魚用具即可開始釣魚。你可以在城鎮、營地和其他許多地方的水域附近找到釣魚用具。

釣魚時，按[Activate]收線。釣魚線大力抽動時收線，就能把上鉤的魚拉回。

丟出釣魚線後，水面上的漣漪代表附近的魚。如果丟出釣魚線後水面很平靜，表示無魚可捕。魚群會在一天後回歸釣魚地點。

黎明和黃昏時能釣到更多魚，也有更高機率釣到少見的魚。

original: There was nothing on your line.
string: 你的釣魚線上沒有東西。

original: Small fish put here will be placed inside the fish tank.
string: 放在這裡的小魚會被放進魚缸。

original: Only one fish can be mounted to a plaque.
string: 一塊飾板只能放一條魚。

original: You can't place that many fish inside this fish tank.
string: 這個魚缸不能放這麼多魚。

Press [Activate] to reel in your line

string: 你現在可以用矮人材質鍛造新裝備。

original: Press [Activate] to pull in your catch
You can only put large fish in this fish tank.

string: 這個魚缸可以再放%.0f條魚。

original:
Fishing

While fishing, press Activate to reel in your line. Reeling when there is a strong pull on your line will reel in your catch.

Ripples on the surface when casting your line are from nearby fish. If the water is calm when you cast your line, there are no more fish to catch here. Fish will return in a day's time.
string:
釣魚

釣魚時，按[Activate]收線。釣魚線大力抽動時收線，就能把上鉤的魚拉回。

丟出釣魚線後，水面上的漣漪代表附近的魚。如果丟出釣魚線後水面很平靜，表示此處無魚可捕。魚群會在一天後回歸。

original: You must have a fishing rod equipped to use this.
string: 你必須裝備釣竿才能使用。

original: You can only put small fish in this fish tank.
